results.title: Metformin in non-alcoholic steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: We treated 20 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who had @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatohepatitis@@@ but were not @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcoholics@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500 mg three times a day for 4 months), an agent that improves hepatic @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity.

citations.NLM: Marchesini G, Brizi M, Bianchi G, Tomassetti S, Zoli M, Melchionda N. Metformin in non-alcoholic steatohepatitis. Lancet. 2001 Sep 15;358(9285):893-4. PMID: 11567710
citations.BibTeX: @article{11567710, title={Metformin in non-alcoholic steatohepatitis.}, author={Marchesini G and Brizi M and Bianchi G and Tomassetti S and Zoli M and Melchionda N}, journal={Lancet}, volume={358}, number={9285}, pages={893-4}}

results.title: Contra-indications to metformin therapy are largely disregarded.
results.text_hl: The risk factors to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ included advanced @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ in 51%, @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ in 9.8%, chronic @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcohol abuse@@@ in 3.3%, advanced @DISEASE_Peripheral_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D016491 @@@peripheral vascular disease@@@ in 2%, and pregnancy in 0.7%.

citations.NLM: Holstein A, Nahrwold D, Hinze S, Egberts EH. Contra-indications to metformin therapy are largely disregarded. Diabet Med. 1999 Aug;16(8):692-6. PMID: 10477216
citations.BibTeX: @article{10477216, title={Contra-indications to metformin therapy are largely disregarded.}, author={Holstein A and Nahrwold D and Hinze S and Egberts EH}, journal={Diabet Med}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={692-6}}

results.title: [Severe lactic acidosis during acute alcoholic intoxication in a patient without kidney failure treated with metformin].
results.text_hl: [Severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ during acute @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcoholic@@@ intoxication in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ without @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney failure@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@].

citations.NLM: Charbonnel B, Peltier P, Ozanne P, Chupin M, Beutter D. [Severe lactic acidosis during acute alcoholic intoxication in a patient without kidney failure treated with metformin]. Nouv Presse Med. 1978 Sep 9;7(29):2573-4. PMID: 704329
citations.BibTeX: @article{704329, title={[Severe lactic acidosis during acute alcoholic intoxication in a patient without kidney failure treated with metformin].}, author={Charbonnel B and Peltier P and Ozanne P and Chupin M and Beutter D}, journal={Nouv Presse Med}, volume={7}, number={29}, pages={2573-4}}

results.title: Variations in Metformin Prescribing for Type 2 Diabetes.
results.text_hl: Most providers would adjust @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for varying severity of @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@hepatic dysfunction@@@ (74%) and @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcohol abuse@@@ (40%).

citations.NLM: Goldberg T, Kroehl ME, Suddarth KH, Trinkley KE. Variations in Metformin Prescribing for Type 2 Diabetes. J Am Board Fam Med. 2015 Nov-Dec;28(6):777-84. PMID: 26546654
citations.BibTeX: @article{26546654, title={Variations in Metformin Prescribing for Type 2 Diabetes.}, author={Goldberg T and Kroehl ME and Suddarth KH and Trinkley KE}, journal={J Am Board Fam Med}, volume={28}, number={6}, pages={777-84}}

results.title: [Biguanide].
results.text_hl: Caution is advised to avoid use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ at risk for @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (e.g., in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with advanced @DISEASE_Hepatic_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D048550 @@@renal and liver insufficiency@@@, @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@, @DISEASE_Dehydration @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcoholism@@@, or in those using diuretics or @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT2@@@ inhibitor).

citations.NLM: Ohta A, Tanaka Y. [Biguanide]. Nihon Rinsho. 2015 Mar;73(3):397-401. PMID: 25812364
citations.BibTeX: @article{25812364, title={[Biguanide].}, author={Ohta A and Tanaka Y}, journal={Nihon Rinsho}, volume={73}, number={3}, pages={397-401}}
